name: Dead Roads: Zombies & Highway
description:
Zombie apocalypse has begun! Choose car or truck and drive on highway full of dead monsters! Smash blocky undead horde in this scary survival lite racing game - for free!

Shooting zombies in the world of survival
It’s a zombie shooter! Smash them! Start zombi age hunt as a driving killer on this hell highway! Scary zombie games for boys - not for little girls! Don’t let the undead stop you on this infinite road to survival. Just tap tap to run over cube hostile monsters! Use different blocky guns or RPGs. Watch for obstacles like burning cars, barrels and wreckages! Swipe to the sides and avoid crashing. Pixel stupid zombies horde will try everything to get you! It’s an apocalypse on highway and you have to survive! Save the world in this sandbox lite minigore shooting zombie game! Target & smash or fire the gun! Put an end to the zombie age with this epic shooter racing game roadkiller!

Smash any dead target
If it bleeds, you can kill it! Choose one of many available cube cars or trucks and transform stupid zombies into square roadkill! Completely free! Shoot them down by guns or RPGs! Be creative! Infinite possibilities in this minigore shooting zombie games! Survive on the endless highway road in this grim destructible environment, full of scary dead hostile monsters! Zombie apocalypse! It’s a survival game for big boys! Be a killer of stupid zombies in this sandbox lite racing games! With quick car and big gun you can save the pixel world from any blocky dead! Pixel art survival shooter for brave cool boys!

Endless killing road
Blocky car armageddon begins! Kill every stupid zombie and escape the apocalypse! This blocky hell highway is full of dead roadkill. Target them, tap tap and shoot! Zombi shooting hunt never ends! Become a pro undead killer and unlock new square cars, trucks and guns. Shooting and killing cube scary stupid zombies is in your blood. Jump into this minigore sandbox racing game roadkiller with lite survival elements! Explore a hellish highway, avoid obstacles and kill off every dead target! It’s a free best game for boys in world!

UPCOMING FEATURES:
Multiplayer!
Co-op mode!
Apocalypse + mode!
New cars and trucks to choose!
New scary stupid monsters to kill!
New weapons of destruction to customize your car or truck!
More obstacles!
More varied environments to explore!
